profile:
FloorCraft is Toronto based flooring installation company. We install hardwood, laminate, tiles, trims and repair sub floors. Striving for customer satisfaction, we provide reliable, fast, clean, professional installation service and waste management. We're proud to be the part of the solution.

We serve all the Greater Toronto Area (GTA) and Surrounding Areas. Contact us Today for a Free Estimate.
products: Hardwood floor, Engineered floor, Laminate floor, Vinyl, Tile, Baseboards, Shoe-moulds, Quarter-rounds, Door frames and Stairs
services:
CONSULTATION
We help our clients to make the right choice about their flooring. Our experienced staff  can advise on the kind of flooring to choose from, providing clear information on preparations required and the installation process.
​
DEMOLITION 
We remove your old flooring, clean up the subfloor as needed and provide waste disposal.
​
SUB FLOORING
At FloorCraft we're proud to be the part of the solution to any problem you have about your floors such as squeaking, cracks, uneven surface and/or levelling. Our staff go beyond screwing down the subfloor but remove subfloors if necessary to get to the root of the problem.
​
INSTALLATION
We provide proper installation for every scenario using the right tools and techniques. We offer professional hardwood, laminate, vinyl and tile installation, as well as stair resurfacing. We work efficiently to meet the necessary deadlines and doing everything properly the first time.
